known_issues: Profile Setup can throw `baselineAccess ... data is undefined` when ensureRegisteredUser/baseline registration fails (e.g., missing caffeineUserToken/caffeineAdminToken URL params).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add principal ID hrxqg-aty7r-ze5hr-pldpb-ool7h-fy2rn-npy5t-lvtmr-lccbl-bdj53-pae as an application administrator

Grant administrator permissions to the Principal ID `hrxqg-aty7r-ze5hr-pldpb-ool7h-fy2rn-npy5t-lvtmr-lccbl-bdj53-pae` so that this identity is recognized by backend authorization as an application administrator (i.e., passes all `#admin` permission checks and returns `true` from `isCallerAdmin()`).

projectName: Add a specific Principal as application administrator
